name: Clin N Liver
title: Clinical N
notes:
**Note:**  Code only regional nodes and nodes, NOS, in this field.  Distant nodes are coded in M (distant metastasis).

**Regional lymph nodes:**

    Hepatic, NOS:
       Hepatic artery
       Hepatic pedicle
       Inferior vena cava
       Porta hepatis (hilar) (in hilus of liver)
    Hepatoduodenal ligament
    Inferior phrenic
    
    Periportal
    Portal vein
rows: Regional lymph nodes cannot be assessed

Clinical evaluation but unknown results or regional lymph node involvement not stated
Clinical evaluation done but results not documented in patient record

Regional lymph node(s), NOS
Lymph nodes, NOS

Stated as N1
Clinical N is not defined for the specific site/histology

No clinical evaluation of regional lymph nodes
Cancer first detected on surgical resection
Unknown if any clinical assessment performed
